data.pricing_trends: Prices for tours range from $500 to $1500 depending on inclusions and duration. During peak season (Q4), prices can increase by up to 20%.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking window is 3 to 6 months before travel for the best deals, especially during the peak season. Early bird discounts are often available.
data.demand: Travel demand to Guatemala is on the rise, especially among adventure travelers and history enthusiasts. Popularity of eco-tourism is also increasing.
data.competition: Alternative destinations include Costa Rica and Belize, typically offering similar cultural and nature experiences but can be more expensive.
